tweetnimage.name: Tweetnimage
tweetnimage.summary: Tweetnimage uses AI to generate an image from the text of your tweet, directly posts it to Tweeter and show a gallery with all your tweets and stats. Requires login with Tweeter and have free (basic) and paid (premium) subscription

night-palette.name: Night Palette
night-palette.summary: Dark Mode Color Palettes for Designers and Artists
features: light-weight app, scalable, with very fast load times

covid.name: Covid 19
covid.summary: Covid 19 is an information app to check the latest statistics for the COVID 19 outbreak. The project uses React with hooks for the front end, Mongodb and node js in the back end. It's hosted in firebase (static) and heroku.
features: update news & covid 19 stats hourly via API
zoomable map with tooltips and colors
timeline graph with statistics per country
server with endpoints for statistics and news

looneycam.name: Looney-Cam
looneycam.summary: LooneyCam is a project that takes a regular image and adds to it funny eyes. You can also add a text or voice message and send it to your contacts using your favorite sharing app.
features: available to download from google play store
code supported for android and ios devices

weatherapp.name: Weather App
weatherapp.summary: A weather app built with React, Redux, and a customized webpack setup. Connects to the API of Accuweather and shows the weather for any city in the world.
features: auto-detect and fetch weather for your current city
save in local storage your favorite cities
display favorite cities in separate route
link to city 5 day forecast upon click

instaclone.name: Instaclone
instaclone.summary: Instaclone is a functional copy of Instagram the full experience of users creating their profiles, sharing images and comments. and exploring into other users posts. Instaclone uses React (class components) in the front end and node js with express in the back end. The project is hosted in firebase (front), heroku (back) and storage in firestore.
features: REST API for profile, posts, comments, and likes
authorization using JWT token and cookies

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.summary: Sentinel is startup project with social impact. The code for this project is private and a demo can be scheduled upon request.

bezeq.name: Bezeq
bezeq.summary: Bezeq is a visual only static website based on a Zeplin design. The page is responsive for mobile and pc and hosted in firebase.
features: hover triggered animations on icons and some elements
images carousel in the bottom of the page (mobile)
progressive statusbar based on input value
